snacks.name: Kimchi Tater Tots
snacks.description: Crispy tater tots topped with spicy kimchi, scallions, and a sriracha-mayo drizzle.

snacks.name: Cheddar Pretzel Bites
snacks.description: Warm soft pretzel bites served with smoked cheddar hot-dog dip.

snacks.name: Tempura Corn Dog Bites
snacks.description: Mini hot dog pieces battered in light tempura and served with wasabi mustard.

hot_dogs.name: Tokyo Street Dog
hot_dogs.description: All-beef hot dog topped with teriyaki glaze, nori flakes, pickled daikon, and wasabi mayo.

hot_dogs.name: Tex-Mex Fusion Dog
hot_dogs.description: Beef hot dog with jalapeño queso, guacamole, pico de gallo, and crushed tortilla chips.

hot_dogs.name: Currywurst Reboot
hot_dogs.description: Pork hot dog topped with curried ketchup, sautéed onions, and sweet mustard aioli.

hot_dogs.name: Banh Mi Dog
hot_dogs.description: Hot dog with pickled carrots, cucumber, cilantro, sriracha mayo, and pork pâté spread.

desserts.name: Churro Dog Bites
desserts.description: Sweet mini hot dog pastry bites in churro dough with cinnamon sugar and chocolate dip.

desserts.name: PB&J Dog Sundae
desserts.description: Vanilla ice cream topped with peanut butter sauce, berry compote, and hot dog crumbles.

desserts.name: Maple Bacon Donut Dog
desserts.description: Glazed donut bun with a maple sausage link, candied bacon, and powdered sugar.
